definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers

sentences.english: The basic style of MENG Hao-ran's poetry is "simple and elegant".
sentences.chinese: 孟浩然詩歌的基本風格是“清淡”。

sentences.english: The first volume focuses on the study of Haoran and Poem Ousia Study.
sentences.chinese: 上編是對孟浩然及其詩歌的本體研究。

sentences.english: Li Bai and Meng Haoran were contemporary poets living in Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李白和孟浩然是生活在唐朝的同一時代的詩人。

definition: Du Fu (712-770), great Tang dynasty poet
Lu Zhaolin (637-689), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]

Su Shi (1037-1101), also known as Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡[Su1 Dong1 po1] northern Song Dynasty writer and calligrapher/one of the Three Su father and sons 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1] and one of the Eight Giants of Tang and Song Prose 唐宋八大家[Tang2 Song4 Ba1 Da4 jia1]
Wang Bo (650-676), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]
Cui Hao (-754), Tang dynasty poet and author of poem Yellow Crane Tower 黃鶴樓|黄鹤楼
Luo Binwang (640-684), one of Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]
Liu Zongyuan (773-819), Tang essayist and poet, advocate of the classical writing 古文運動|古文运动 and neoclassical 復古|复古 movements
